Package co.uk.genonline.simpleweb.web.gallery

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Gallery
    Created by thomassecondary on 20/04/15.
    GalleryHtmlGenerator
    Defines interface to be used for classes which generate the HTML to drive a gallery.
    GalleryImage
    Created by thomassecondary on 20/04/15.
    GalleryManager
    Generic type to manage the folders of images which will be used to generate galleries for display on a website.

    Created by thomassecondary on 20/04/15.
    ThumbnailManager
    Created by thomassecondary on 20/04/15.

    GalleryManagerDefault
    Date: 07/07/2012 Time: 15:49 Manages all the galleries in a website.
    GalleryStatus
    Created by thomassecondary on 01/05/15.
    ImageFileFilter
    Created with IntelliJ IDEA.
    ImageHelper
    Created by thomassecondary on 20/04/15.
    ThumbnailManagerDefault
    Class which handles the creation of a thumbnail folder and thumbnail files for galleries Includes following functionality: - Check existence of thumbnail folder and creates / recreates as appropriate - Checks whether thumbnails have changed since last time called (this will save time and resources to recreate every time) - Generates thumbnails for each file in the gallery, using supplied maximum height and width Created by thomassecondary on 18/04/15.
